message.body: Hey Sam. We're trying to figure out how we're getting to the restaurant. We didn't want to ask phuong so as not to be late so I think we're gonna take the train. Are you traveling with us or are we meeting you and Jeff there?
Oh! He's picking me up. I'm sorry, I didn't know you wouldn't have a ride.
That's ok. Just wanted to make sure what you were doing. We'll meet you there. No worries.
